p: Last, several respondents in our study reported the absence of important basic protective materials, such as gloves, masks and goggles– a fact already well documented during the 2013–2016 EVD outbreak [ 30]. PPE seemed to be less available in urban than in rural healthcare facilities. According to some HCW, this was due to a temporary distribution problem since specialized treatment centres for infectious diseases have opened in 2018 in urban areas. These centres stockpiled specialized gear such as PPE for urban healthcare facilities in preparation for future outbreaks.
